is available, the space must be marked to indicate that. | | | | | Section 1- Identification | | | | | | Product Name | Lithium Battery | | | | | Manufacturer's name, address, telephone | Manufacturer: GP Batteries International Ltd. | | | | | number | Address: 7/F, Building 16W, 16 Science Park West Avenue, Hong Kong | | | | | | Science Park, New Territories, Hong Kong | | | | | | Tel: +852-24843111 | | | | | Emergency phone number | Within USA and Canada: 1-800-424-9300 | | | | | | Outside USA and Canada: +1 703-527-3887 | | | | | Date of prepared and revision | Jan 1, 2021 | | | | | Section 2 â€“ Hazards Identification | | | | | | GHS Classification: | N/A | | | | The battery is sealed hermetically.

key_compatibility.related_product: burning batteries may irritate eyes skin and throat

open or leaking batteries | | | | | | Ventilation | Room ventilation may be required in areas where there are open or leaking batteries | | | | | Protective Gloves | Use neoprene or natural rubber gloves if handling an open or leaking battery battery | | | | | | materials should be collected in a leak-proof container
Accidental short circuit for a few seconds will not seriously affect the battery
The battery may be regulated by national or local regulation
The materials and pack design shall be chosen so as to prevent the development of unintentional electrical conduction corrosion of the terminals and ingress of moisture
